thread.title: Faced Sexual harassment by the hotel staff: not at all safe for women
thread.title_full: Faced Sexual harassment by the hotel staff: not at all safe for women - Review of Marrakech Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: barnali c
title: Faced Sexual harassment by the hotel staff: not at all safe for women
text: As a grad-student I was traveling alone to Columbia University and I checked into this hotel on 27th February,2017 afternoon. A hotel boy (later came to know from the manager that his name is Kenny) harassed me sexually when he was guiding me to the room. Immediately I checked out of the hotel as I felt traumatized and extremely unsafe. Please avoid and boycott this hotel. Not at all safe for women.
